description: We present you with another new face here at Hogtied! Hollie is your typical California girl: tall, tan, blond, and beautiful. However, she has another redeeming quality--she is tough. She came to us with limited experience in bondage, and she learned that she loves it. She loves being helpless, she loves the flogger, and she loves the pain and pleasure. Hollie is the real deal, and she sure looks great in a tight Hogtie. Enjoy.
title: Hollie Stevens
